reviewText: This dvd claims to be directed by the British actor, Gary Oldman. This dvd does not appear in any list of Mr. Oldman's official directorial events.

This is the dumbest film since whatever the last dumbest film was. It's not hot, not interesting, not sexy, not worth the price, and the WORST part is, it is too thick to use to balance my coffee table. Amish virgins would find this movie boring.
If you don't want what you pay for, buy this one. It's almost as though they want to make a video without really doing anything. If I'm going to spend money, I want more than teasing.

I know this is softcore, but this is reaching new heights of "softness": the two women in the movie *really* don't do anything! They have no chemistry or interest whatsoever, they avoid kissing and touching at all cost, always stay an inch apart if they can, and the voice over is whiny and boring.

If you like two women playing "pretend" without being threatening, this movie might be for you.

 I bought this DVD based on other reviews, and it will literally end up in the trash. Maybe I'll recycle the case.

Two deliciously gorgeous women with teased hairdos show a variety of ways to please each other, and in the end the viewer is the most pleased of all. It's not hardcore (all they do is foreplay), but they do go from head to toe with a great deal of teasing but no genital stimulation. This is not a 'how to' video with specific instructions, but is instead two women loving each other accompanied by soft, romantic lighting and music.

There are 4 main interludes with lots of caressing, kissing, fondling, and stroking. The women are very feminine and caring with each other. Nice music adds to the romantic mood. There is some voiceover narration from one of the women, but you might find it more distracting than helpful to the mood.
Great soft girl girl video...very pretty, senuous, with lots of kissing and touching

I wish I would have bought the video from you, since your price is less than I paid for it.  This is a great how to video that really helped my wife and I in the field of romance.  I wish there were more out there like  this one.  Please let me know if this company does any others.  Thanks
